works.description:
The offender has copied from two articles.  Starting with the sentence, "Macs and PCs have been made out to be two completely different things..." from the first article listed below, and the sentence, "The million dollar question. Macs and PCs both have their pros and cons. But, if you had to pick one, what would you choose - a Mac or a PC?, copying the paragraphs, "
"Why MACs are Better", "Why PCs are Better" and "Conclusion"
